summary: Mimicking early silent films, Independencia creates a lush metaphor that plays with cinematic illusions and the cultural and mythical history of the Philippines.
cast: Sid Lucero|Tetchie Agbayani|Alessandra de Rossi|Mika Aguilos|Bodjie Pascua|Lui Manansala|Richard Gonzales|Carl Lawrence Lagasca|Bong Cabrera|Lav Diaz|Arnold Reyes|Angeli Bayani|Adriana Agcaoili|Lowell Conales|Nikki Ocampo|Nino Aguilar|Gilda Aguilos|Via Antonio|Juan Miguel Severo|Ness Roque|Ramon Sarmiento|Abner Delina|Ris Ricio|Vanessa Ulgado|Arleen Cuevas|Joan Quiros|Roeder Camanag|Kalila Aguilos|Joseph Mango|Jonibo Arma|Aldrin Abanto|Jerold King Abanto|Sony Boy Ressurecsion|Rodolfo Dela Cruz|Darwin Banares|Dominador Avedano|Jela Magtaos|Anday Magtaos|Apolonia Magtaos|Jaquiline Maglalang|Lilibeth Rivas|Emilia Abdulah|Belen Arma|Matilde Escuzar|Jovel Mae Espiritu Santo|Jenalyn Vasquez|Katkat Pangan|Ungo Pangan|Chamcham Pangan|Angel Pangan|Joacim Strandell|Rodger Sargent|Bob Smith|Marjohn Buncio|Paul Salas|Emmanuel Ramos

title: Independencia
